'''Paul Drayton''' (born [[28 December]] [[1944]]) is a British musician who composed the [[The Hobbit (1967 stage adaptation)|1967 stage adaptation of ''The Hobbit'']] with [[Humphrey Carpenter]].

Drayton is the Musical Director of Duchy Opera in Cornwall.<ref>{{webcite|website=[http://www.duchyopera.co.uk/ Duchy Opera]|articleurl=http://www.duchyopera.co.uk/who.html|articlename=Who|accessed=11 November 2014}}</ref>
